snippet: Known as T-DM1, the drug delayed the progression of cancer by three months in a late-stage clinical trial of 991 women with metastatic breast cancer.
abstract: Investigators report the drug T-DM1, developed by Genentech, delayed the progression of cancer by three months in a late-stage clinical trial of 991 women with metastatic breast cancer; drug lacks some side effects of traditional treatments and appears to substantially prolong lives.
lead_paragraph: Known as T-DM1, the drug delayed the progression of cancer by three months in a late-stage clinical trial of 991 women with metastatic breast cancer.

headline.main: In Study, Drug Delays Worsening of Breast Cancer, With Fewer Side Effects
headline.print_headline: In Study, Drug Delays Worsening of Breast Cancer, With Fewer Side Effects
